text: allāhu tān sr̥ṣṭicca niravadhi vastukkaḷāl niṅṅaḷkk taṇaluṇṭākki. parvataṅṅaḷil avan niṅṅaḷkk abhayasthānaṅṅaḷumuṇṭākki. niṅṅaḷe cūṭil ninn kātturakṣikkunna vastraṅṅaḷ nalki. yud'dhavēḷayil sanrakṣaṇamēkunna kavacaṅṅaḷuṁ pradānaṁ ceytu. ivvidhaṁ allāhu tanṟe anugrahaṁ niṅṅaḷkk pūrttīkariccutarunnu; niṅṅaḷ anusaraṇamuḷḷavarākān
